name: Wolf Sheep Cabbage (MEATBOG)
description:
River crossing puzzle game, based on the medieval riddle about the farmer with a wolf, sheep and cabbage.

CONTROLS:

- click on the titlescreen to continue to level

- click on a character or the boat to move them

- click on the undo or redo button for undo or redo

- keyboard A and D also move the boat

- keyboard R is for undo

- you can use the period and comma keys on the keyboard to skip a level forward or backward, this functionality is mainly there so you can skip around levels if you have completed them previously. skipping a level you are stuck on is HEAVILY discouraged.

Thank you for playing!

Game design, development & art - Mick Peters / mickelbach: https://mickelbach.itch.io/

Sound design - Helena Thomas / 65finally: https://twitter.com/65finally
